title: Firefox Update Version 94
content:
Thanks to Firefox update......version 94! 

Unable to read pages properly(white?)......they somehow changed my colour/color settings!!

Tried to reset through basic settings page, 'preferences > language and appearance > colours' but does not want to keep settings!! I wish Firefox wouldn't do this......waste peoples time......early versions were brilliant!! Like micosoft early versions.....but now......hmmm..... Grrr......
creator: hotcorbra

title: how do I delete JSON files
content: I usually have back ups for my FF profiles. Today I found that I have too many back-ups and started deleting the old FF Profiles. Most of it will delete normally. But it will NOT delete the JSON files. Is there a special way to remove these outdated JSON files?
creator: Ohana46
